name: biomni-analyze-chromatin-interactions
title: Biomni: Analyze Chromatin Interactions
description: Analyze Hi-C data to identify enhancer-promoter interactions and topologically associating domains (TADs)
content:
Overview

Analyzes chromatin interactions from Hi-C data to identify enhancer-promoter interactions, CTCF binding sites, and topologically associating domains (TADs). Uses cooler format for efficient Hi-C matrix operations.

Features

  • Hi-C contact matrix analysis
  • Enhancer-promoter interaction detection
  • TAD boundary identification
  • Regulatory element enrichment analysis

Input

  • Hi-C file in .cool or .hic format
  • BED file with regulatory elements (enhancers, promoters, CTCF sites)

Output

Interaction maps, TAD boundaries, and enrichment statistics
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/genomics/analyze_chromatin_interactions.py "${hicFile}" "${regulatoryBed}" -o "${outputDir}"
